p: In conclusion, the current study shows the potential of coriander essential oil as an antifungal and herbicidal agent, either as a standalone or in mixtures with SEO. Furthermore, it could be shown that the herbicidal effect and weed seed germination inhibition of CEO is enhanced due to the synergistic effect of the chemical components. Therefore, the CEO used alone or in mixtures with other EOs could be a useful alternative for organic farming.
